title: 315: Ghosts Talk to Us + Aliens in the House + Spooky Family Stories w/ Roz Drezfalez
itunes:title: 315: Ghosts Talk to Us + Aliens in the House + Spooky Family Stories w/ Roz Drezfalez
description:
The Broads are joined by their favorite, Roz Drezfalez, for their annual spooky Halloween episode! It’s a wild one! They chat about Roz’s recent haunted experiences and UFO spotting, use an EMF detector and spirit box, meet Alvin the extra terrestrial, share some of their families seriously creepy stories, and a whole lot more! 

 

ROZ HERNANDEZ aka ROZ DREZFALEZ (she/they):

Follow Roz: https://www.instagram.com/rozhernandez/Listen to “Ghosted with Roz Drezfalez”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/ghosted-by-roz-drezfalez/id1450864418

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITTER.COM and use code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***FLEX FIT: Go to FLEXFITS.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits  or 10% off your first Flex Cup + free U.S shipping! 

***OAK ESSENTIALS: Go to OAKESSENTIALS.COM to get the 5-step routine for $195 or 15% off first product with code CHATTY

***PELOTON: Experience Peloton bike now $400 less - go to ONEPELOTON.COM to learn more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
